subject: Doping (Sports)
Tests (Drug Use)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: In a statement Tuesday, Dino Laurenzi Jr., who handled Ryan Braun’s urine sample last October, said it was established protocol to take samples home if they could not be mailed immediately.
snippet: In a statement Tuesday, Dino Laurenzi Jr., who handled Ryan Braun’s urine sample last October, said it was established protocol to take samples home if they could not be mailed immediately.
